pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============================================JobSpire truth table remote control python lib==============================================----------------How to implement----------------.. code-block:: python # establish connection with jobspire nitra = Nitra( username='username', secret='secret password', base_url='http://full_jobspire_url.dk/nitra', ensure_connected=True ) # usage: nitra.get_job_areas() nitra.insert_job_postings(List[dict]) nitra.insert_job_posting_skills(List[dict]) nitra.delete_job_postings_by_source_id(source_ids: List[str]) nitra.delete_job_postings_by_uuid(ids: List[str]) nitra.update_job_postings(patches_with_id: List[dict]) nitra.get_job_postings_with_no_word_embs() nitra.delete_job_posting_skills(job_posting_ids: List[str]) nitra.ping() nitra.get_statistics() nitra.get_contract_types() nitra.get_esco_codes() nitra.add_company_esco_matches(company_esco_matches: List[dict])-----------Development-----------To build:``python3 -m build``To release:``./release.sh``
